Package com.quanta.hcbiapi

Class Summary
Adam4055 Class to control ADAM 4055 RS485 to GPO converter
Button Class to judge the key event is short press or long press
Ethernet Class to control Ethernet
Gpio Class to control HCBI external GPIO
Ir Class to control IR MCU
Led Class to control HCBI LED
Rs485 This class is for open/read/write RS485 port.
Sys Class that provides system APIs
Touch  
Version This class provide the version of HCBI API
 

Enum Summary
Adam4055.Gpo GPO number of ADAM 4055
Adam4055.Level GPO level of ADAM 4055
BaudRate Baud rate for Rs485
Gpio.Gpi GPI pin
Gpio.Gpo GPO pin
Gpio.Level GPIO level
Ir.Fan Fan speed for air conditioner
Ir.Key Keys for A/V device
Ir.Mode Operation mode for air conditioner
Ir.Port IR Tx port
Ir.Power Power state for air conditioner
Ir.RxKey Received keys from TouchLife TLT-SRC3200 remote controller
Ir.Temp Temperature for air conditioner
Led.setName LED name list: ALERT, MAIL, MESSAGE, SECURITY, CALL, POWER
Rs485.Port RS485 port
